TopicTitle: The perfect very long range flying lab for surface planet exploration and interplanetary flights

Articles.Content:
Its 4 tweakscaled nuclear lightbulb engines give it 10400 DV which allow very long interplanetary transfert far beyond Jool.

They are vectored with Hinges from infernal robotics that allow horizontal flight as well as vertical flight over low gravity planet surface for exploration.

Hovering has never been so easy with the preset values.

It is perfectly balanced and easy to pilot in any mod.

An underskin network of Radial heatsinks coupled with 4 deployable radiators provide a super heat management. Tested up to 3250m/s during Kerbin aerobraking.

Its 4 Karbonite mini drills coupled with a Converter make it independent of any refueling station or refinery, provided you have send a ship to scan and map the planet you want to explore.

An internal electric network working automatically leaves you free with all maneuvers needing electricity, even when engines not running.

8 repackables chutes allow a Kerbin landing at full weight.

You can add more science stuff, but be careful for balancing.

You can even tweakscale the engines if you need, (for Duna for example) but you will have to build a file for the Nuclearbulb engines from Porwork as they are not included in the Tweakscale mod.

Dockable if you need.

All science stuff resettable via ladders.

Automatic flight if needed.
